Text: Though I can't seed 24/7, I'll seed as much as I can! It would be great if you could seed too.

@Nizzemanden;
This is just a mix of songs that most fashioncore-wearers listens to. I've been walking around downtown asking those in fashioncore what music they listen to, and some of them said CTTS, so therefore I included it.
You should all be shot in the back of your heads..
how can U do a music tape of a style that has to do whit clothes and not music?

@Cyralund; I was waking around downtown and asking people that was wearing "fashioncore" clothes, and they named those bands I included. So the most appropriate name I came up with was "Fahsioncore Mixtape" because that's their style, and this is the music they listen to.

I've been listening to Hardcore since 1987 (yeah I'm an old fuck) and just discovered CTTS about 30 mins ago.  I haven't been this blown away by a band since... well, many years.
Almost makes me want to go to shows again...almost.
